page.title: 06WEEKEND FAMILY ACTIVITIES
page.content: We usually get up late on a weekend except when we go to the swimming baths. We have a late breakfast of crumpets and bacon or sometimes eggs and blackpudding. Then after braekfast we sometimes do gardening. We have a late meal round about six o,clock and we have the traditional Roast Beef,Carrots,Peas and Potatoes. Sometimes my Mum makes Yorkshire Puddings with onions in the mixture and hot onion gravy. We usually have wine but I don't like it so I have a drink of coke. Then we sit down and watch T.V for the rest of the night.
